lines.text: That's the British response to everything. The King has abdicated, have a cup of tea. Hitler's invaded Poland, have a cup of tea. The atom bomb has dropped, have a cup of tea.
My late husband - he was an engine driver, you know...
[Ethel is on the telephone, booking a haircut for a passenger]
Yes, it does grow faster in the summer. Let's hope it doesn't fall out in the autumn!
